item.title: Transferring Files
item.description: Following are some example commands for transferring files and folders to and from the server. Remember: You must have permissions to access the target folder on the server to which you wish to move your file Your terminal must be on your computer to move files (that is, your pwd should be somewhere on your own computer) Transfer files from your own computer to the server scp /path/to/file/FILENAME mahuika:/path/to/target/folder grep -c '>' FILENAME (Note the colon ‘:’ after the server name.
